Award Title: GB-Telford: Joint Economic and Housing Development Needs Assessment
Award Description: The Economic and Housing Development Needs Assessment (EHDNA) will identify future economic and housing (including affordable and specialist housing) growth needs across the Borough. The study is a key requirement of the evidence base for the review of the Telford & Wrekin Local Plan (TWLP).
Supplier Address - street address:
4 Abbey Court
        Fraser Road
        Priory Business Park
        Bedford
        MK44 3WH

Award Title: GB-Telford: Integrated Appraisal for the review of the Telford & Wrekin Local Plan
Award Description: The Integrated Appraisal is a systematic process that must be carried out during the preparation of local plans and spatial development strategies. Its role is to promote sustainable development by assessing the extent to which the emerging plan, when judged against reasonable alternatives, will help to achieve relevant environmental, economic and social objectives.. The IA is a key requirement of the evidence base for the review of the Telford & Wrekin Local Plan (TWLP). The IA includes both the Sustainability Appraisal requirements as well as the Habitat Regulations Assessment of the Local Plan.
Supplier Address - street address:
Aldgate Tower
        2 Leman Street
        London
        E1 8FA

Award Title: GB-Telford: Landscape and Visual Sensitivity Study
Award Description:
Telford & Wrekin Council wishes to appoint a contractor to undertake a L&VS Study in support of the review of the Telford & Wrekin Local Plan (TWLP) which the Council is currently undertaking.
      
      The study will assess the sensitivity of land around key settlements within the borough to housing, employment and mixed use development. The oucomes of the study will feed into the selection of appropriate sites for allocation as part of the Local Plan Review and will identify appropriate land uses and mitigation measures where required
